About Me

Hello! My name is Sam and I'm a recent graduate who's looking to make an entrance in the IT field. In particular, I hope to enter into the Data Science and Analytics sector. I graduated from Truman State University with a BS in Mathematics and a minor in Statistics. Currently, I am attending a data science certificate program at Washington University in St. Louis, and I hope to further my post-graduate education with a Masters in Data Science and Analytic Storytelling.

© 2021. Thanks for visiting!
